documentation.text:
A mapping of modifiers to rewards for each staker's
 address.
A mapping of token addresses to staking configurations.
An array of stakable ERC721 token addresses.

The reward token (college credit) to be issued
 to stakers.
Claims the rewards for the caller.

Gets the College Credit dividend of the provided user.
 @param _user the user whose dividend we are checking.

Gets the total amount staked for a given token address.
 @param _token the address to get the amount staked from.

@return if the given token address is stakable.
 @dev does not check if is ERC721, that is up to the user.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IMDStaking.StakableTokenAttributes storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
Gets the College Credit dividend of the provided user.
 @param _user the user whose dividend we are checking.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IMDStaking.StakableTokenAttributes storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IMDStaking.StakableTokenAttributes storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

addStakableToken(address,uint256,uint256.details: owner only, doesn't allow adding already staked tokens

params._maxYield: the maximum yield for the stakable token.
params._minYield: the minimum yield for the stakable token.
params._step: the amount yield increases per yield period.
params._yieldPeriod: the length (in seconds) of a yield period (the amount of period after which a yield is calculated)

params._maxYield: the maximum yield for the stakable token.
params._minYield: the minimum yield for the stakable token.
params._step: the amount yield increases per yield period.
params._yieldPeriod: the length (in seconds) of a yield period (the amount of period after which a yield is calculated)

params._user: the user whose dividend we are checking.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to mint.
params._recipient: the recipient of the minted tokens.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

stake(address,uint256).details: the contract must be approved to transfer that token first.      the address must be a stakable token.

params._token: the address of the stakable token.
params._tokenId: the id of the token to stake.

stakeFor(address,address,uint256).details: the contract must be approved to transfer that token first.      the address must be a stakable token.

params._token: the address of the stakable token.
params._tokenId: the id of the token to stake.
params._user: the user from which to transfer the token.

stakedTokenIds(address,address).details: reverts if called on an invalid token address.

params._token: the address of the token contract being analyzed.
params._user: the user whose token ids are being analyzed.

returns._0: an array of token ids staked by that user.

params._token: the address to get the amount staked from.

totalStakedFor(address,address).details: reverts if called on an invalid token address.

params._token: the address of the contract whose staked tokens we are skimming.
params._user: the user whose stakes are being counted.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(address,uint256).details: reverts if the token is not owned by the caller.

params._token: the address of the token contract that the token belongs to.
params._tokenId: the id of the token to unstake.

unstakeAndClaimRewards(address,uint256).details: reverts if the token is not owned by the caller.

params._token: the address of the token contract that the token belongs to.
params._tokenId: the id of the token to unstake.

addStakableToken(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Adds a new token that can be staked in the contract.

claimRewards().notice: Claims the rewards for the caller.

constructor.notice: The constructor for the staking contract, builds the initial reward token and stakable token.

dividendOf(address).notice: Gets the College Credit dividend of the provided user.

mintRewardToken(address,uint256).notice: Mints the reward token to an account.

rewardToken().notice: The reward token (college credit) to be issued to stakers.

stakableTokenAttributes(address).notice: A mapping of token addresses to staking configurations.

stake(address,uint256).notice: Stakes a given token id from a given contract.

stakeFor(address,address,uint256).notice: Stakes a given token id from a given contract.

stakedTokenIds(address,address).notice: Gets all of the token ids that a user has staked from a given contract.

totalStaked(address).notice: Gets the total amount staked for a given token address.

totalStakedFor(address,address).notice: Gets the total amount of tokens staked for the given user in the given contract.

unstake(address,uint256).notice: Unstakes a given token held by the calling user.

unstakeAndClaimRewards(address,uint256).notice: Unstakes a given token held by the calling user AND withdraws all dividends.
